extendedInfo.description: Surf Sticker is the theme set for surfer girls. The 3 home screens are filled with cute icons like stickers.It works with the free home app (launcher) Flick'n Change. Once you purchased this application, Flick'n Change(launcher) would be installed automatically at the same time.*Ex post facto accounting. Cancellation is acceptable if you would not agree with the price which fluctuates between 1-10Euro daily.[Caution]After the installing, the application has to be remaining in menu while you are setting this theme on your phone,Once you take this application away from your smart phone, the theme would not work again properly. So please do NOT delete it.
